sentence.Network_en: She is Anna's guardian ad litem for the trial.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是安娜法律程序期间的监护人.

sentence.Network_en: The guardian of a person limited capacity for civil conduct shall be his agent ad litem.
sentence.Network_cn: 不满十周岁的未成年人是无民事行为能力人,由他的法定代理人代理民事活动.

sentence.Network_en: Lee zhi fu , Cao Cao, etc. They are also not neglect Shengtang busy ad litem.
sentence.Network_cn: 李知府 、 曹操等他们也不敢怠慢,忙升堂审案.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Agent adlitem诉讼代理人，常用于书面用语。Attorney一词广泛用于美国，指授权为当事人代理案件的律师；英格兰法律中，attorney一词指.

article 61 who serves as an agent ad litem and other agents ad litem have the right to investigate and collect evidence , and may have access to materials pertaining to the case .第六十一条代理诉讼的律师和其他诉讼代理人有权调查收集证据，可以查阅本案有关材料。
Agent adlitem诉讼代理人，常用于书面用语。Attorney一词广泛用于美国，指授权为当事人代理案件的律师；英格兰法律中，attorney一词指.
